ygData.subject: RE: Pottery NERFed
ygData.msgSnippet: The only saving grace I saw was the 700 plat I made overnight buying sketches at a silver each and selling them back post-patch at almost 5 gold each. Not a
ygData.messageBody:
The only saving grace I saw was the 700 plat I made overnight buying
sketches at a silver each and selling them back post-patch at almost 5
gold each. Not a bad return for 20 plat invested.

-----Original Message-----
From: Mitchell Okun
[mailto:Mitchell_Okun@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 2:36 PM
To: EQ_Potters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Potters] Pottery NERFed

From: "Mitchell Okun" <Mitchell_Okun@...>



<<Remember the good old days back when patches used to
help players and fix
problems instead of cause them? What ever happened to
those days? =)>>

From what i understand, and guesses that i'm making
based on the REST of the
patch, there seems to be one way for the Potter to still
make a profit:

Befriend a Rogue.

Seems that one of the new sketches we get are Vials,
which i would suspect are
necessary for Rogues to make and apply poison.

Well, they wanted it that you need another player to
make a profit; there's the
only thing *i* can see that is our saving grace.

- Nikolita, Floating Merchant
